goals.active: Speak to Braham and Eir in Hoelbrak.
goals.complete: I met Braham in Hoelbrak, and together we talked to Eir about the summit. She didn't believe Knut Whitebear would leave Hoelbrak so long as the Svanir were terrorizing the Shiverpeaks. We vowed to win Whitebear's good will by disrupting the Svanir presence in Frostgorge Sound.

goals.active: Help the Vigil disrupt the Sons of Svanir presence in Frostgorge Sound.
goals.complete: In the Highpeaks of Frostgorge Sound, I joined the local Vigil to raid the Barrowstead and disrupt a Sons of Svanir shamanic ritual. Eir and Braham will know if what I've done is enough to turn Knut Whitebear's attention from Jormag's followers to the threat posed by Mordremoth.

goals.active: Meet Braham and Eir at the destroyed dragon totem.
goals.complete: Eir and Braham fought their way to meet me at the dragon totem. Eir was confident that Knut Whitebear would agree to attend the summit at the Grove with the Sons of Svanir shamans now beaten back. I could tell that things were still awkward between the two of them, but that fighting alongside one another gave them some common ground to stand on.
